title: If You Invested $100 In This Stock 15 Years Ago, You Would Have $2,000 Today By Benzinga
text:
© Reuters. If You Invested $100 In This Stock 15 Years Ago, You Would Have $2,000 Today BIDU -0.14% Add to/Remove from a Portfolio Add to Watchlist Add Position Position added successfully to:
Please name your holdings portfolio Type: BUY SELL Date: Amount: Price Point Value: Leverage: 1:1 1:10 1:25 1:50 1:100 1:200 1:400 1:500 1:1000 Commission: Create New Watchlist Create Create a new holdings portfolio Add Create + Add another position Close Benzinga - by Benzinga Insights, Benzinga Staff Writer.
Baidu (NASDAQ:BIDU) has outperformed the market over the past 15 years by 10.52% on an annualized basis producing an average annual return of 22.39%. Currently, Baidu has a market capitalization of $41.32 billion.
Buying $100 In BIDU: If an investor had bought $100 of BIDU stock 15 years ago, it would be worth $1,959.22 today based on a price of $118.18 for BIDU at the time of writing.
Baidu's Performance Over Last 15 Years
Finally -- what's the point of all this? The key insight to take from this article is to note how much of a difference compounded returns can make in your cash growth over a period of time.
